Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 19/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
